action.name: Optimus G Unlock
action.description: This will unlock you device using the ics sbl stack without installing a custom recovery

action.description: This will Disable LGE Security and enable you to uninstall system apps

action.description: This will backup your efs partitions, which contain your network values

action.name: CWM-6.0.4.7
action.description: This will install CWM-6.0.4.7

action.name: loki_recovery
action.description: This will loki the recovery image as needed

action.name: Revert ZVA Aboot
action.description: This will revert the Sprint ZVA/ZVC update to ZV8 aboot

action.name: TWRP-2.6.3.3
action.description: This will install TWRP-2.6.3.3

action.name: loki_recovery
action.description: This will loki the recovery image as needed

action.description: This will revert the Sprint ZVA/ZVC update to ZV8 aboot

action.name: Disable LGE Security
action.description: This will Disable LGE Security and enable you to uninstall system apps

action.name: loki_boot
action.description: This will loki the boot image as needed

action.name: loki_check
action.description: This will check if the aboot is supported by loki

action.name: loki_boot
action.description: This will loki the boot image as needed

action.name: loki_recovery
action.description: This will loki the recovery image as needed

action.name: loki_update_zip
action.description: This will update a zip with a newer version of loki_patch and loki_flash

action.name: Backup EFS
action.description: This will backup your efs partitions, which contain your network values

action.name: Restore EFS
action.description: This will restore your efs partitions, which contain your network values

action.name: Restore All Backups
action.description: This will restore EFS, boot and recovery with backups if these exists
